member.name: T:GPlanner.Maui.Converters.InvertedBooleanConverter
member.summary: Converts a boolean value to its inverse. Can also convert boolean to two specified strings (or image sources) based on the input.
member.remarks: Usage Examples: 1. Invert boolean: IsEnabled="{Binding IsBusy, Converter={StaticResource InvertedBooleanConverter}}" 2. Swap strings: Text="{Binding IsDone, Converter={StaticResource InvertedBooleanConverter}, ConverterParameter='Task Not Done|Task Complete'}"

member.summary: Executes the logic for when just changed.
member.param: The new property value that was set.
member.remarks: This method is invoked right after the value of is changed.
